description: The schema represents the height above or below a fixed reference point, most commonly a reference geoid, a mathematical model of the Earth's sea level as an equipotential gravitational surface.

references.description: The LOINC code represents Altitude (Length:Point in time:^Patient:Quantitative).

The unit of measure of the element. Basic unit is meter (m) [ http://unitsofmeasure.org/ucum.html#para-28 ]. Allowed values are drawn from the SI Length Units and English Length Units Common Synonyms (non-UCUM). The valid UCUM code is different for inch ([in_i]), foot ([ft_i]), yard ([yd_i]) and mile ([mi_i]).
